description.value: The Deathwardens are a mysterious order of acolytes who guard the separation of life and death. Their qualms are not with necromantic magic in general—as they incorporate the mastery of such energies into their techniques—but rather those who would violate the sanctity of graveyards or seek immortality through undeath.

system.classDetails:
Standalone Archetype: Deathwarden

Unlock: When you reach 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class.

Class Features at Higher Levels

Class Categorization: Martial
Rest Dice Gain After 1st Level: 1d10 per Deathwarden level
Hit Point Gain After 1st Level:
- 1d10 + your Constitution modifier
- Or 6 + your Constitution modifier
Mana: +1

Spellcasting Attribute: Abilities in this class use the same spellcasting attribute as your Dread Blade cantrip.

➢ Spell Save DC: 8 + your proficiency bonus + your spellcasting attribute modifier.

🆓 Given Abilities: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.5GKWWIQFXU0YBEWB]{Tools of the Harvest}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.WXAA4GO3QQKD1H7M]{Loyal Weapon}

Deathwarden Abilities

When taking a level in Deathwarden, you may choose from the following abilities:
